definition: conveniently/without extra trouble/while doing it/in passing
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: I jotted down stray thoughts and memories in the middle of the night.
sentences.chinese: 我將午夜無眠時零散的思緒和記憶隨手記下。

sentences.english: I took a great dislike to the clock, so I chucked it in the dustbin .
sentences.chinese: 我很討厭那隻鍾，隨手就把它扔進垃圾桶裏了。

sentences.english: He grabbed his little hand bell and placed it on the lotus flower.
sentences.chinese: 隨手就把他的小引磬，放在蓮花上面。

sentences.english: He turned off the lights when he left, saved it again.
sentences.chinese: 他走的時候隨手關燈了，又省下了。

sentences.english: When leaving your guestroom, please turn off the power switch and air-conditioner to save energy.
sentences.chinese: 離開房間的時候請隨手關燈和空調以節省能源。

sentences.english: He closed the door softly behind him.
sentences.chinese: 他隨手輕輕地把門關上了。

sentences.english: And strange to say the ordinary, just pick a fold down switchgrass.
sentences.chinese: 說來奇特而又普通，就只是一根隨手摺下來的柳枝。

sentences.english: Turn the light off as you go out.; Please switch off the lights when you leave.
They cut what locks there were with scissors.
sentences.chinese: 他們用剪子絞下隨手抓住的一絡絡頭髮。

sentences.english: Mine I had snatched from my knees and held over my head, by a sort of instinct.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉從擱板上一把抓起她的寬邊草帽隨手扣在頭上。

sentences.english: Because what we really need to chuck is this old-school throw-away mindset.
sentences.chinese: 我們真正要拋棄的是這種隨手即丟的陳腐心態。

sentences.english: Spray readily maintain skin vitality, Qingre heat.
sentences.chinese: 隨手噴噴，保持肌膚活力，清熱消暑。

sentences.english: He potted at rabbits with his new gun.
sentences.chinese: 他用新槍隨手射擊兔子。

sentences.english: Forest fires are often caused by broken glass or by cigarette ends which people carelessly throw away.
sentences.chinese: 森林火災時常由破玻璃或人們隨手扔掉的香菸頭引起。

sentences.english: That day, Big Xu stuck his knife in the door sill for a moment while he did something else.
sentences.chinese: 那天，大許忙此外事時，隨手把他的刀子插在門檻上。

sentences.english: The injuries were mainly caused by bare-hands, secondly by blunt or sharp at hand.
sentences.chinese: 致傷方式以拳腳爲主，其次爲隨手可得的鈍器或銳器。

as one wishes/according to one's wishes/at will/voluntary/conscious
